column2: Given some libraries exist in RFDoc

column3: When user opens library with version information

column2: Then library name, version and documentation are shown

column3: When user opens library without version information

column2: Then library name and documentation are shown
and no version information is shown

column3: When user opens library with initialization information
When user opens library without initialization information

column2: Then library initialization is not shown
Then keywords are listed with name, argument and documentation information

column1: Total number of keywords is visible

column2: Then total number of keywords in library is shown
Then list of keywords linking to the keyword details is shown

column1: Keyword documentation can contain keyword-to-keyword links

column2: Then link exist from keyword documentation to another keyword
